@paigekeffer @BadSaintDC The dessert was excellent. A milk-and-cereal inspired cocoa rice cake with condensed milk and rice puffs. And service was really attentive too. All in all, worth it for sure and eager to try it again. FYI, put my name in at 6pm, got a 10:15pm seating.

@paigekeffer @BadSaintDC Started with a radish dish with burnt coconut and an ube purée that was great, a pork blood stew that was very tasty (but there were whole slices of pork fat that turned me off), and fettuccine with a mild crab mustard sauce (eh), but unexpectedly had uni (I hate briny things).

@paigekeffer @BadSaintDC Personally, I give this first experience a 7/10. I understand why it is so acclaimed — it’s bold and adventurous. But this night’s menu wasn’t my cup of tea. Pork belly and seafood dominant menu, my two least favorite. But it was def good enough for me to try again.
